I started watching this...at the start I was saying "what the hell? This should be some amazing sci-fi stuff, but this is lame and cheesy." I kept watching, waiting for it to get better. After about 40 minutes, I couldn't take it any more and turned it off. This pilot is terrible, I do not know if I will be willing to try to finish watching it much less watch episode #2.

You all tell me, does it turn into some good sci-fi in the last half of the pilot or just a really lame old west murder whodunnit with really bad character development set in a near future Philly populated by a few really bad looking alien races along with earthlings?

I rfecall the commercials, you know...it looked so amazing and you are wondering is this a new tv show or a movie or a video game??? The you find out it is a game and a tv show and you can't wait to see the tv show. Well, talk about a severe  let-down! It seemed almost as bad as all of those stupid lame TV movies "SyFy" pays for to ensure they have a new movie every Saturday night.

With the CG available today, SyFy could be working on some very incredible projects...so where are they? Defiance does not appear to be what we (or at least I) had hoped for.
Upload quality was great, no problems. The show was okay. I just don't like having to suspend my disbelief so much while watching it.

btw, I meant st. louis, not philly. :P

I am going to *try* to watch this again...
